item.title: Cocktail Bucket List
item.description: Cocktails I have all (or almost) of the ingredients (including simple substitutions) that I would like to try. NB: All sourced from the Joy of Mixology book by Gary Regan unless stated otherwise. Interesting (in no particular order) ¶ Kamikaze Caricature Cocktail Daiquiri Treacle Other (in no particular order) ¶ John Collins Rickey Oriental Cocktail Sazerak Shandy The Bedford Blackthorn Bronx Cocktail Caprisca (sp?

item.title: Everyone is John and/or George
item.description: How to Play ¶ The GM reveals John’s tagline to players, setting the scene and giving a bit of context for the adventure John will be going on. The PCs talk through and create their Voices’ skills (GM must approve all skills) using the following command: /set skills skill1: Drinking excessive amounts of Pilk skill2: Making Pilk Choose 2 skills, gain 10 Willpower Choose 3 skills, gain 7 Willpower For maximum fun, don’t pick skills that are similar to skills that other players have /set skills skill1: Drinking excessive amounts of Pilk skill2: Making Pilk skill3: Quick Reflexes Each PC must secretly send their obsessions to the GM for approval beforehand, some private back-and-forth may occur to make them just right).

item.title: Music
item.description: Here’s all the music I’ve ever produced. I wasn’t very prolific and I don’t think any of it is great but here it is for posterity. Maybe I’ll get back into making music again soon. Your browser does not support the audio element. first.wav: The first song I produced for fun using Bosca Ceoil sometime in ~2016. Your browser does not support the audio element.
